title: Facebook Marketplace Lets Users Sell Recalled Baby Products, Lawmakers Say
description: The bipartisan letter says Meta Platforms has risked public safety.

title: This $599 Putting Green Improved My Golf Game. It Might Work For You.
description: The Puttr training aid promises to make practicing your putt so much fun you’ll actually do it. One writer put his handicap on the line.

title: Microsoft Submits Revised Activision Deal to U.K. Watchdog
description: The new proposal is an effort to win approval for a $75 billion deal to acquire the videogame maker after the competition agency rejected it earlier this year.
